metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48571 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
memcached 1.6.7 allows a Denial of Service via multi-packet uploads in UDP.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48571` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

memcached - 1.5.22-2ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: memcached package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.22-2ubuntu0.3').
